select pui.id, pui.code, pui.supplier_id, pui.amount, pui.purchaser, pui.create_date, pui.status, pui.logistics, pui.total_price, ei.name, ei.credit_code, ei.industry from purchase_info pui left join enterprise_info ei on (ei.id = pui.supplier_id) where 1 = 1
AND pui.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
AND pui.purchaser LIKE CONCAT('%',#{purchaser},'%')
AND pui.status = #{status}
order by pui.create_date desc
